StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [SearchQSNs]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @QSNID uniqueiden..er, @OrgUnitID int, @BCN varchar(25), @FiscalYear int, @FromDate date.me, @ToDate date.me, @StatusDisposi.on int, @QSNSerialNumber varchar(10), @PackageType varchar(10), @RUCID int, @MOSID int, @SortColumnNumber int, @ColumnSortOrder bit, @startRowIndex int, @maximumRows int
) AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED declare @totalrows int
IF (@QSNSerialNumber is not null) Begin SELECT @totalrows = Count(*) FROM [dbo].[QSN] q LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[PayGrade] pg ON pg.PayGradeID = q.PayGradeID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[ApplicantPackage] ap ON q.QSNID = ap.QSNID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[Lead] l ON l.LeadID = ap.LeadID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[Recruit]r ON r.RecruitID = l.RecruitID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[Person] p ON p.PersonID = r.PersonID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[LeadStatusDisposi.on] lsd ON lsd.LeadID = l.LeadID
LEFT JOIN [dbo].[StatusDisposi.on] sd ON sd.StatusDisposi.onID = lsd.StatusDisposi.onID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[Status] s ON s.StatusID = sd.StatusID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[Disposi.on] d ON d.Disposi.onID = sd.Disposi.onID
LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[Recruiter] recruiter ON recruiter.RecruiterID = l.AssignedRecruiterID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[Person] recPerson ON recPerson.PersonID = recruiter.PersonID
LEFT JOIN [dbo].[vwOrgUnitIDs] orgs ON q.AssignedOrgUnitID = orgs.root LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRegion ON orgRegion.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.Region LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRS ON orgRs.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.RS LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRSS ON orgRss.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.RSS
LEFT JOIN [dbo].[vwOrgUnitIDs] recOrgs ON recruiter.Organiza.onID = recOrgs.root LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] recOrgRegion ON recOrgRegion.PSROrgUnitID = recOrgs.Region LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] recOrgRS ON recOrgRs.PSROrgUnitID = recOrgs.RS LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] recOrgRSS ON recOrgRss.PSROrgUnitID = recOrgs.RSS
LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[ApplicantPackageType] apt ON apt.ApplicantPackageTypeID = q.ApplicantPackageTypeID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[MOS] m ON m.MOSID = q.MOSID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[RUCReserveUnit] rru ON rru.RUCReserveUnitID = q.RUCReserveUnitID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[RUC] ruc ON ruc.RUCID = rru.RUCID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[ReserveUnit] ru ON ru.ReserveUnitID = rru.ReserveUnitID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[MSC] msc ON rru.MSCID = msc.MSCID
WHERE q.serialNumber like @QSNSerialNumber And (q.AssignedOrgUnitID in( Select OrgUnitID from (Select Region,RS,RSS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where HQ = @OrgUnitID) p UNPIVOT (OrgUnitID for Sta.ons in(Region,RS,RSS)) As unpvt union Select OrgUnitID from (Select RS,RSS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where Region = @OrgUnitID) p UNPIVOT (OrgUnitID for Sta.ons in(RS,RSS)) As unpvt union Select RS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where RSS = @OrgUnitID union Select RSS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where RS = @OrgUnitID union Select RSS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where RSS = @OrgUnitID union
Select @OrgUnitID ) OR @OrgUnitID IS NULL OR @OrgUnitID = 0) AND (q.BCN = @BCN OR @BCN IS NULL) AND (q.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear OR @FiscalYear IS NULL) AND (l.DateAssigned >= @FromDate OR @FromDate IS NULL) AND (l.DateAssigned <= @ToDate OR @ToDate IS NULL) AND (q.SerialNumber LIKE @QSNSerialNumber+'%' OR @QSNSerialNumber IS NULL) AND (m.MOSID = @MOSID OR @MOSID = 0 OR @MOSID IS NULL) AND (ruc.RUCID = @RUCID OR @RUCID = 0 OR @RUCID IS NULL) AND (lsd.StatusDisposi.onID = @StatusDisposi.on OR @StatusDisposi.on = 0 OR @StatusDisposi.on IS NULL) AND (apt.Descrip.on LIKE @PackageType+'%' OR @PackageType IS NULL)
SELECT RowNum, @totalrows AS TotalRows, QSNID, UnitLoca.on, QSNSelected,LeadID, LeadTitle, LeadFirstname, LeadMiddleName, LeadLastName, LeadNameSu.x, QSN_SerialNumber, Region, PSRS, PSRSS, ReserveUnit, RUCID, RUC, MSC, MOSID, MOS, Grade, GradeDescrip.on, FY, Assigned, LeadSSN, PackageType, JoinDate, JoinCredit, RecruiterTitle, RecruiterFirstname, RecruiterMiddleName, RecruiterLastName, RecruiterNameSu.x, RecruiterPSRS, RecruiterPSRSS, RankCategory, QSNChangeRequestID, StatusDisposi.onDescript FROM (SELECT
(CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 1 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY SerialNumber ASC)) WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 1 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY SerialNumber DESC))
WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 2 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY ruc.Descrip.on ASC)) WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 2 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY ruc.Descrip.on DESC))
WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 3 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY m.Descrip.on ASC) ) WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 3 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY m.Descrip.on DESC) )
WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 4 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY q.PayGradeID ASC)) WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 4 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY q.PayGradeID DESC))
WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 5 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY q.UnitLoca.on ASC)) WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 5 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY q.UnitLoca.on DESC))
WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 6 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY orgRS.Descrip.on ASC)) WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 6 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY orgRS.Descrip.on DESC))
WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 7 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY orgRSS.Descrip.on ASC)) WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 7 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY orgRSS.Descrip.on DESC))
WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 8 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY recPerson.LastName ASC)) WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 8 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY recPerson.LastName DESC))
WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 9 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY ap.QSNSelected_Date ASC)) WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 9 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY ap.QSNSelected_Date DESC))
WHEN @SortColumnNumber in(10,11) AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY DateAssigned ASC)) WHEN @SortColumnNumber in(10,11) AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY DateAssigned DESC))
WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 12 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY p.LastName ASC)) WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 12 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY p.LastName DESC))
WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 13 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY s.Descrip.on ASC)) WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 13 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY s.Descrip.on DESC))
ELSE (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY SerialNumber ASC)) END
) as RowNum, q.QSNID AS QSNID, q.UnitLoca.on AS UnitLoca.on, ap.QSNSelected_Date AS QSNSelected, l.LeadID AS LeadID, p.Title AS LeadTitle, p.FirstName AS LeadFirstname, p.MiddleName AS LeadMiddleName, p.LastName AS LeadLastName, p.NameSu.x AS LeadNameSu.x, SerialNumber AS QSN_SerialNumber, orgRegion.Descrip.on AS Region, orgRS.Descrip.on AS PSRS, orgRSS.Descrip.on AS PSRSS, ru.Descrip.on AS ReserveUnit, rru.RUCID, ruc.Descrip.on AS RUC, msc.Descrip.on AS MSC, q.MOSID, m.Descrip.on AS MOS, q.PayGradeID AS Grade, pg.Descrip.on As GradeDescrip.on, q.FiscalYear AS FY, DateAssigned AS Assigned, p.SSN AS LeadSSN, q.ApplicantPackageTypeID AS PackageType, DateProjectedJoin AS JoinDate, DateJoinCredit AS JoinCredit, recPerson.Title AS RecruiterTitle, recPerson.FirstName AS RecruiterFirstname, recPerson.MiddleName AS RecruiterMiddleName, recPerson.LastName AS RecruiterLastName, recPerson.NameSu.x AS RecruiterNameSu.x, recOrgRS.Descrip.on AS RecruiterPSRS, recOrgRSS.Descrip.on AS RecruiterPSRSS, q.PayGradeType AS RankCategory, qsncr.QSNChangeRequestID AS QSNChangeRequestID, s.Descrip.on+ISNULL('-'+d.Descrip.on,'') AS StatusDisposi.onDescript FROM [dbo].[QSN] q LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[PayGrade] pg ON pg.PayGradeID = q.PayGradeID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[ApplicantPackage] ap ON q.QSNID = ap.QSNID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[Lead] l ON l.LeadID = ap.LeadID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[Recruit]r ON r.RecruitID = l.RecruitID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[Person] p ON p.PersonID = r.PersonID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[LeadStatusDisposi.on] lsd ON lsd.LeadID = l.LeadID
LEFT JOIN [dbo].[StatusDisposi.on] sd ON sd.StatusDisposi.onID = lsd.StatusDisposi.onID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[Status] s ON s.StatusID = sd.StatusID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[Disposi.on] d ON d.Disposi.onID = sd.Disposi.onID
LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[Recruiter] recruiter ON recruiter.RecruiterID = l.AssignedRecruiterID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[Person] recPerson ON recPerson.PersonID = recruiter.PersonID
LEFT JOIN [dbo].[vwOrgUnitIDs] orgs ON q.AssignedOrgUnitID = orgs.root LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRegion ON orgRegion.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.Region LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRS ON orgRs.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.RS LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRSS ON orgRss.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.RSS
LEFT JOIN [dbo].[vwOrgUnitIDs] recOrgs ON recruiter.Organiza.onID = recOrgs.root LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] recOrgRegion ON recOrgRegion.PSROrgUnitID = recOrgs.Region LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] recOrgRS ON recOrgRs.PSROrgUnitID = recOrgs.RS LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] recOrgRSS ON recOrgRss.PSROrgUnitID = recOrgs.RSS
LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[ApplicantPackageType] apt ON apt.ApplicantPackageTypeID = q.ApplicantPackageTypeID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[MOS] m ON m.MOSID = q.MOSID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[RUCReserveUnit] rru ON rru.RUCReserveUnitID = q.RUCReserveUnitID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[RUC] ruc ON rru.RUCID = ruc.RUCID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[ReserveUnit] ru ON rru.ReserveUnitID = ru.ReserveUnitID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[MSC] msc ON rru.MSCID = msc.MSCID
LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[QSNChangeRequest] qsncr ON q.QSNID = qsncr.QSNID and qsncr.QSNChangeRequestStatusID = 1
WHERE (q.QSNID = @QSNID OR @QSNID IS NULL ) AND (q.AssignedOrgUnitID in( Select OrgUnitID from (Select Region,RS,RSS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where HQ = @OrgUnitID) p UNPIVOT (OrgUnitID for Sta.ons in(Region,RS,RSS)) As unpvt union Select OrgUnitID from (Select RS,RSS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where Region = @OrgUnitID) p UNPIVOT (OrgUnitID for Sta.ons in(RS,RSS)) As unpvt union Select RS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where RSS = @OrgUnitID union Select RSS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where RS = @OrgUnitID union Select RSS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where RSS = @OrgUnitID union --Select RSS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] --where RS in(Select RS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where RSS = @OrgUnitID) --union Select @OrgUnitID ) OR @OrgUnitID IS NULL OR @OrgUnitID = 0) AND (q.BCN = @BCN OR @BCN IS NULL) AND (q.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear OR @FiscalYear IS NULL) AND (l.DateAssigned >= @FromDate OR @FromDate IS NULL) AND (l.DateAssigned <= @ToDate OR @ToDate IS NULL) AND (q.SerialNumber LIKE @QSNSerialNumber OR @QSNSerialNumber IS NULL) AND (m.MOSID = @MOSID OR @MOSID = 0 OR @MOSID IS NULL) AND (ruc.RUCID = @RUCID OR @RUCID = 0 OR @RUCID IS NULL) AND (lsd.StatusDisposi.onID = @StatusDisposi.on OR @StatusDisposi.on = 0 OR @StatusDisposi.on IS NULL) AND (apt.Descrip.on LIKE @PackageType OR @PackageType IS NULL)
) AS QSN WHERE @startRowIndex is null OR (RowNum BETWEEN @startRowIndex AND (@startRowIndex + @maximumRows) - 1)
Order By RowNum return End
Else SELECT @totalrows = Count(*) FROM [dbo].[QSN] q LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[PayGrade] pg ON pg.PayGradeID = q.PayGradeID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[ApplicantPackage] ap ON q.QSNID = ap.QSNID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[Lead] l ON l.LeadID = ap.LeadID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[Recruit]r ON r.RecruitID = l.RecruitID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[Person] p ON p.PersonID = r.PersonID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[LeadStatusDisposi.on] lsd ON lsd.LeadID = l.LeadID
LEFT JOIN [dbo].[StatusDisposi.on] sd ON sd.StatusDisposi.onID = lsd.StatusDisposi.onID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[Status] s ON s.StatusID = sd.StatusID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[Disposi.on] d ON d.Disposi.onID = sd.Disposi.onID
LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[Recruiter] recruiter ON recruiter.RecruiterID = l.AssignedRecruiterID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[Person] recPerson ON recPerson.PersonID = recruiter.PersonID
LEFT JOIN [dbo].[vwOrgUnitIDs] orgs ON q.AssignedOrgUnitID = orgs.root LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRegion ON orgRegion.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.Region LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRS ON orgRs.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.RS LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRSS ON orgRss.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.RSS
LEFT JOIN [dbo].[vwOrgUnitIDs] recOrgs ON recruiter.Organiza.onID = recOrgs.root LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] recOrgRegion ON recOrgRegion.PSROrgUnitID = recOrgs.Region LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] recOrgRS ON recOrgRs.PSROrgUnitID = recOrgs.RS LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] recOrgRSS ON recOrgRss.PSROrgUnitID = recOrgs.RSS
LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[ApplicantPackageType] apt ON apt.ApplicantPackageTypeID = q.ApplicantPackageTypeID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[MOS] m ON m.MOSID = q.MOSID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[RUCReserveUnit] rru ON rru.RUCReserveUnitID = q.RUCReserveUnitID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[RUC] ruc ON ruc.RUCID = rru.RUCID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[ReserveUnit] ru ON ru.ReserveUnitID = rru.ReserveUnitID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[MSC] msc ON rru.MSCID = msc.MSCID
WHERE (q.QSNID = @QSNID OR @QSNID IS NULL) AND (q.AssignedOrgUnitID in( Select OrgUnitID from (Select Region,RS,RSS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where HQ = @OrgUnitID) p UNPIVOT (OrgUnitID for Sta.ons in(Region,RS,RSS)) As unpvt union Select OrgUnitID from (Select RS,RSS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where Region = @OrgUnitID) p UNPIVOT (OrgUnitID for Sta.ons in(RS,RSS)) As unpvt union Select RS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where RSS = @OrgUnitID union Select RSS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where RS = @OrgUnitID union Select RSS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where RSS = @OrgUnitID union
Select @OrgUnitID ) OR @OrgUnitID IS NULL OR @OrgUnitID = 0) AND (q.BCN = @BCN OR @BCN IS NULL) AND (q.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear OR @FiscalYear IS NULL) AND (l.DateAssigned >= @FromDate OR @FromDate IS NULL) AND (l.DateAssigned <= @ToDate OR @ToDate IS NULL) AND (q.SerialNumber LIKE @QSNSerialNumber+'%' OR @QSNSerialNumber IS NULL) AND (m.MOSID = @MOSID OR @MOSID = 0 OR @MOSID IS NULL) AND (ruc.RUCID = @RUCID OR @RUCID = 0 OR @RUCID IS NULL) AND (lsd.StatusDisposi.onID = @StatusDisposi.on OR @StatusDisposi.on = 0 OR @StatusDisposi.on IS NULL) AND (apt.Descrip.on LIKE @PackageType+'%' OR @PackageType IS NULL)
SELECT RowNum, @totalrows AS TotalRows, QSNID, UnitLoca.on, QSNSelected,LeadID, LeadTitle, LeadFirstname, LeadMiddleName, LeadLastName, LeadNameSu.x, QSN_SerialNumber, Region, PSRS, PSRSS, ReserveUnit, RUCID, RUC, MSC, MOSID, MOS, Grade, GradeDescrip.on, FY, Assigned, LeadSSN, PackageType, JoinDate, JoinCredit, RecruiterTitle, RecruiterFirstname, RecruiterMiddleName, RecruiterLastName, RecruiterNameSu.x, RecruiterPSRS, RecruiterPSRSS, RankCategory, QSNChangeRequestID, StatusDisposi.onDescript FROM (SELECT
(CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 1 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY SerialNumber ASC)) WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 1 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY SerialNumber DESC))
WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 2 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY ruc.Descrip.on ASC)) WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 2 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY ruc.Descrip.on DESC))
WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 3 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY m.Descrip.on ASC) ) WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 3 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY m.Descrip.on DESC) )
WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 4 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY q.PayGradeID ASC)) WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 4 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY q.PayGradeID DESC))
WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 5 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY q.UnitLoca.on ASC)) WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 5 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY q.UnitLoca.on DESC))
WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 6 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY orgRS.Descrip.on ASC)) WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 6 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY orgRS.Descrip.on DESC))
WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 7 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY orgRSS.Descrip.on ASC)) WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 7 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY orgRSS.Descrip.on DESC))
WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 8 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY recPerson.LastName ASC)) WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 8 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY recPerson.LastName DESC))
WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 9 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY ap.QSNSelected_Date ASC)) WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 9 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY ap.QSNSelected_Date DESC))
WHEN @SortColumnNumber in(10,11) AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY DateAssigned ASC)) WHEN @SortColumnNumber in(10,11) AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY DateAssigned DESC))
WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 12 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY p.LastName ASC)) WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 12 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY p.LastName DESC))
WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 13 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY s.Descrip.on ASC)) WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 13 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY s.Descrip.on DESC))
ELSE (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY SerialNumber ASC)) END
) as RowNum, q.QSNID AS QSNID, q.UnitLoca.on AS UnitLoca.on, ap.QSNSelected_Date AS QSNSelected, l.LeadID AS LeadID, p.Title AS LeadTitle, p.FirstName AS LeadFirstname, p.MiddleName AS LeadMiddleName, p.LastName AS LeadLastName, p.NameSu.x AS LeadNameSu.x, SerialNumber AS QSN_SerialNumber, orgRegion.Descrip.on AS Region, orgRS.Descrip.on AS PSRS, orgRSS.Descrip.on AS PSRSS, ru.Descrip.on AS ReserveUnit, rru.RUCID, ruc.Descrip.on AS RUC, msc.Descrip.on AS MSC, q.MOSID, m.Descrip.on AS MOS, q.PayGradeID AS Grade, pg.Descrip.on As GradeDescrip.on, q.FiscalYear AS FY, DateAssigned AS Assigned, p.SSN AS LeadSSN, q.ApplicantPackageTypeID AS PackageType, DateProjectedJoin AS JoinDate, DateJoinCredit AS JoinCredit, recPerson.Title AS RecruiterTitle, recPerson.FirstName AS RecruiterFirstname, recPerson.MiddleName AS RecruiterMiddleName, recPerson.LastName AS RecruiterLastName, recPerson.NameSu.x AS RecruiterNameSu.x, recOrgRS.Descrip.on AS RecruiterPSRS, recOrgRSS.Descrip.on AS RecruiterPSRSS, q.PayGradeType AS RankCategory, qsncr.QSNChangeRequestID AS QSNChangeRequestID, s.Descrip.on+ISNULL('-'+d.Descrip.on,'') AS StatusDisposi.onDescript FROM [dbo].[QSN] q LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[PayGrade] pg ON pg.PayGradeID = q.PayGradeID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[ApplicantPackage] ap ON q.QSNID = ap.QSNID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[Lead] l ON l.LeadID = ap.LeadID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[Recruit]r ON r.RecruitID = l.RecruitID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[Person] p ON p.PersonID = r.PersonID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[LeadStatusDisposi.on] lsd ON lsd.LeadID = l.LeadID
LEFT JOIN [dbo].[StatusDisposi.on] sd ON sd.StatusDisposi.onID = lsd.StatusDisposi.onID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[Status] s ON s.StatusID = sd.StatusID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[Disposi.on] d ON d.Disposi.onID = sd.Disposi.onID
LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[Recruiter] recruiter ON recruiter.RecruiterID = l.AssignedRecruiterID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[Person] recPerson ON recPerson.PersonID = recruiter.PersonID
LEFT JOIN [dbo].[vwOrgUnitIDs] orgs ON q.AssignedOrgUnitID = orgs.root LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRegion ON orgRegion.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.Region LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRS ON orgRs.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.RS LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRSS ON orgRss.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.RSS
LEFT JOIN [dbo].[vwOrgUnitIDs] recOrgs ON recruiter.Organiza.onID = recOrgs.root LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] recOrgRegion ON recOrgRegion.PSROrgUnitID = recOrgs.Region LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] recOrgRS ON recOrgRs.PSROrgUnitID = recOrgs.RS LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] recOrgRSS ON recOrgRss.PSROrgUnitID = recOrgs.RSS
LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[ApplicantPackageType] apt ON apt.ApplicantPackageTypeID = q.ApplicantPackageTypeID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[MOS] m ON m.MOSID = q.MOSID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[RUCReserveUnit] rru ON rru.RUCReserveUnitID = q.RUCReserveUnitID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[RUC] ruc ON rru.RUCID = ruc.RUCID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[ReserveUnit] ru ON rru.ReserveUnitID = ru.ReserveUnitID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[MSC] msc ON rru.MSCID = msc.MSCID
LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[QSNChangeRequest] qsncr ON q.QSNID = qsncr.QSNID and qsncr.QSNChangeRequestStatusID = 1
WHERE (q.QSNID = @QSNID OR @QSNID IS NULL ) AND (q.AssignedOrgUnitID in( Select OrgUnitID from (Select Region,RS,RSS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where HQ = @OrgUnitID) p UNPIVOT (OrgUnitID for Sta.ons in(Region,RS,RSS)) As unpvt union Select OrgUnitID from (Select RS,RSS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where Region = @OrgUnitID) p UNPIVOT (OrgUnitID for Sta.ons in(RS,RSS)) As unpvt union Select RS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where RSS = @OrgUnitID union Select RSS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where RS = @OrgUnitID union Select RSS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where RSS = @OrgUnitID union --Select RSS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] --where RS in(Select RS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where RSS = @OrgUnitID) --union Select @OrgUnitID ) OR @OrgUnitID IS NULL OR @OrgUnitID = 0) AND (q.BCN = @BCN OR @BCN IS NULL) AND (q.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear OR @FiscalYear IS NULL) AND (l.DateAssigned >= @FromDate OR @FromDate IS NULL) AND (l.DateAssigned <= @ToDate OR @ToDate IS NULL) AND (q.SerialNumber LIKE @QSNSerialNumber OR @QSNSerialNumber IS NULL) AND (m.MOSID = @MOSID OR @MOSID = 0 OR @MOSID IS NULL) AND (ruc.RUCID = @RUCID OR @RUCID = 0 OR @RUCID IS NULL) AND (lsd.StatusDisposi.onID = @StatusDisposi.on OR @StatusDisposi.on = 0 OR @StatusDisposi.on IS NULL) AND (apt.Descrip.on LIKE @PackageType OR @PackageType IS NULL)
) AS QSN WHERE @startRowIndex is null OR (RowNum BETWEEN @startRowIndex AND (@startRowIndex + @maximumRows) - 1)
Order By RowNum
